document_data.mainbody:
arker was a druid and slave of Baeloth Barrityl.
Parker used his druidic powers to gather groups of spiders and giant spiders. The druid slave was used in the Black Pits arena to fight contestants. He fought with a scimitar and had access to a few spells.
The druid owned a fair amount of magical equipment the Protector of the Second set of armor, the Edventars Gift ring, a periapt of proof against poison, and a golden girdle of Urnst.
He was killed by the Champion of Baeloths Pits and their party in the Black Pits arena.
